        public java.util.List<ListPropertyWidget.Record> getValue()
                                                   throws ControlPanelException
        Returns:
        Returns a list of the ListPropertyWidget.Record objects.
        Each object has a necessary data to control the input form
        Throws:
        ControlPanelException - If failed to read the remote property value

      • add

        public ContainerWidget add()
                    throws ControlPanelException
        Prepares the input form for adding a new record to the list.
        Complete filling the added form by calling the confirm() or the cancel() methods
        Returns:
        A form ContainerWidget to be filled
        Throws:
        ControlPanelException - If failed to call the add method on the remote object

      • delete

        public void delete(short recordId)

        Complete deleting the form by calling the confirm() or the cancel() methods
        Parameters:
        recordId - The record id of the deleted form
        Throws:
